# Warden Frontend Rebuild - Project Setup Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
	Requirements: Vite + React 18 + TypeScript frontend for Warden application with character management, Discord integration, and Studio writing workspace.

- [ ] Scaffold the Project
	Create frontend-src directory with Vite React TypeScript template.

- [ ] Customize the Project
	Add components, routing, API integration, and Studio feature.

- [ ] Install Required Extensions
	ES7+ React/Redux/React-Native snippets, ESLint, Prettier recommended.

- [ ] Compile the Project
	npm install and npm run build.

- [ ] Create and Run Task
	Add dev server task.

- [ ] Launch the Project
	npm run dev on port 5173.

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	Update README with setup instructions.
